verses.verse: Then <S%G5119><s%> some Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> and scribes <S%G1122><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Jesus <S%G2424><s%> from Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

"Why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> do Your disciples <S%G3101><s%> transgress <S%G3845><s%> the tradition <S%G3862><s%> of the elders <S%G4245><s%>? For they do not wash <S%G3538><s%> their hands <S%G5495><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> they eat <S%G2068><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>"

And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "And why <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> do you yourselves <S%G4771><s%> transgress <S%G3845><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for the sake <S%G1223><s%> of your tradition <S%G3862><s%>?

"For God <S%G2316><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> 'Honor <S%G5091><s%> your father <S%G3962><s%> and mother, <S%G3384><s%>' and, 'He who speaks <S%G2551><s%> evil <S%G2551><s%> of father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> let him be put <S%G5053><s%> to death. <S%G2288><s%>'

"But you say, <S%G3004><s%> 'Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall say <S%G3004><s%> to [his] father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother, <S%G3384><s%> "Anything <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> of mine <S%G1473><s%> you might have been helped <S%G5623><s%> by has been given <S%G1435><s%> [to God,]"

he is not to honor <S%G5091><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> his mother. <S%G3384><s%>' And [thus] you invalidated <S%G208><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for the sake <S%G1223><s%> of your tradition. <S%G3862><s%>
"You hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> rightly <S%G2573><s%> did Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> prophesy <S%G4395><s%> of you, saying, <S%G3004><s%>
'This <S%G3778><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> honors <S%G5091><s%> Me with their lips, <S%G5491><s%> But their heart <S%G2588><s%> is far <S%G4206><s%> away <S%G568><s%> from Me.
'But in vain <S%G3155><s%> do they worship <S%G4576><s%> Me, Teaching <S%G1321><s%> as doctrines <S%G1319><s%> the precepts <S%G1778><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%>' "
And after He called <S%G4341><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> to Him, He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Hear, <S%G191><s%> and understand. <S%G4920><s%>

"Not what <S%G3588><s%> enters <S%G1525><s%> into the mouth <S%G4750><s%> defiles <S%G2840><s%> the man, <S%G444><s%> but what <S%G3588><s%> proceeds <S%G1607><s%> out of the mouth, <S%G4750><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> defiles <S%G2840><s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Do You know <S%G3609><s%> that the Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> were offended <S%G4624><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> this <S%G3588><s%> statement <S%G3056><s%>?"

But He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Every <S%G3956><s%> plant <S%G5451><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> My heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> did not plant <S%G5452><s%> shall be rooted <S%G1610><s%> up.

"Let <S%G863><s%> them alone; <S%G863><s%> they are blind <S%G5185><s%> guides <S%G3595><s%> of the blind. <S%G5185><s%> And if <S%G1437><s%> a blind <S%G5185><s%> man <S%G5185><s%> guides <S%G3594><s%> a blind <S%G5185><s%> man, <S%G5185><s%> both <S%G297><s%> will fall <S%G4098><s%> into a pit. <S%G999><s%>"
And Peter <S%G4074><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Explain <S%G5419><s%> the parable <S%G3850><s%> to us."
And He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Are you still <S%G188><s%> lacking <S%G801><s%> in understanding <S%G801><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>?

"Do you not understand <S%G3539><s%> that everything <S%G3956><s%> that goes <S%G1531><s%> into the mouth <S%G4750><s%> passes <S%G5562><s%> into the stomach, <S%G2836><s%> and is eliminated <S%G1519><s%> <S%G856><s%> <S%G1544><s%>?
"But the things that proceed <S%G1607><s%> out of the mouth <S%G4750><s%> come <S%G1831><s%> from the heart, <S%G2588><s%> and those <S%G2548><s%> defile <S%G2840><s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>

"For out of the heart <S%G2588><s%> come <S%G1831><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> thoughts, <S%G1261><s%> murders, <S%G5408><s%> adulteries, <S%G3430><s%> fornications, <S%G4202><s%> thefts, <S%G2829><s%> false <S%G5577><s%> witness, <S%G5577><s%> slanders. <S%G988><s%>

"These <S%G3778><s%> are the things which defile <S%G2840><s%> the man; <S%G444><s%> but to eat <S%G2068><s%> with unwashed <S%G449><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%> does not defile <S%G2840><s%> the man. <S%G444><s%>"
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> away <S%G1831><s%> from there, <S%G1564><s%> and withdrew <S%G402><s%> into the district <S%G3313><s%> of Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon. <S%G4605><s%>

And behold, <S%G2400><s%> a Canaanite <S%G5478><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out from that region, <S%G3725><s%> and [began] to cry <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me, O Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of David; <S%G7035><s%> my daughter <S%G2364><s%> is cruelly <S%G2560><s%> demon-possessed."

But He did not answer <S%G611><s%> her a word. <S%G3056><s%> And His disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to [Him] and kept asking <S%G2065><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Send <S%G630><s%> her away, <S%G630><s%> for she is shouting <S%G2896><s%> out after <S%G3693><s%> us."

But He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "I was sent <S%G649><s%> only <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> to the lost <S%G622><s%> sheep <S%G4263><s%> of the house <S%G3624><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>"
But she came <S%G2064><s%> and [began] to bow <S%G4352><s%> down <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G4352><s%> Him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Lord, <S%G2962><s%> help <S%G997><s%> me!"
And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "It is not good <S%G2570><s%> to take <S%G2983><s%> the children's bread <S%G740><s%> and throw <S%G906><s%> it to the dogs. <S%G2952><s%>"

But she said, <S%G3004><s%> "Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> but even <S%G2532><s%> the dogs <S%G2952><s%> feed <S%G2068><s%> on the crumbs <S%G5589><s%> which fall <S%G4098><s%> from their masters' table. <S%G5132><s%>"

Then <S%G5119><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to her, "O <S%G5599><s%> woman, <S%G1135><s%> your faith <S%G4102><s%> is great; <S%G3173><s%> be it done <S%G1096><s%> for you as you wish. <S%G2309><s%>" And her daughter <S%G2364><s%> was healed <S%G2390><s%> at once. <S%G1565><s%> <S%G5610><s%>

And departing <S%G3327><s%> from there, <S%G1564><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G2064><s%> along <S%G3844><s%> by the Sea <S%G2281><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and having gone <S%G305><s%> up to the mountain, <S%G3735><s%> He was sitting <S%G2521><s%> there. <S%G1563><s%>

And great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to Him, bringing <S%G2192><s%> with them [those who were] lame, <S%G5560><s%> crippled, <S%G2948><s%> blind, <S%G5185><s%> dumb, <S%G2974><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> others, <S%G2087><s%> and they laid <S%G4496><s%> them down <S%G4496><s%> at His feet; <S%G4228><s%> and He healed <S%G2323><s%> them,

so <S%G5620><s%> that the multitude <S%G3793><s%> marveled <S%G2296><s%> as they saw <S%G991><s%> the dumb <S%G2974><s%> speaking, <S%G2980><s%> the crippled <S%G2948><s%> restored, <S%G5199><s%> and the lame <S%G5560><s%> walking, <S%G4043><s%> and the blind <S%G5185><s%> seeing; <S%G991><s%> and they glorified <S%G1392><s%> the God <S%G2316><s%> of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> His disciples <S%G3101><s%> to Him, and said, <S%G3004><s%> "I feel <S%G4697><s%> compassion <S%G4697><s%> for the multitude, <S%G3793><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they have remained <S%G4357><s%> with Me now <S%G2235><s%> three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> and have <S%G2192><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G5100><s%> to eat; <S%G2068><s%> and I do not wish <S%G2309><s%> to send <S%G630><s%> them away <S%G630><s%> hungry, <S%G3523><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> they faint <S%G1590><s%> on the way. <S%G3598><s%>"

And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Where <S%G4159><s%> would we get so <S%G5118><s%> many <S%G5118><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> in a desolate <S%G2047><s%> place <S%G2047><s%> to satisfy <S%G5526><s%> such <S%G5118><s%> a great <S%G5118><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%>?"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "How <S%G4214><s%> many <S%G4214><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> do you have <S%G2192><s%>?" And they said, <S%G3004><s%> "Seven, <S%G2033><s%> and a few <S%G3641><s%> small <S%G2485><s%> fish. <S%G2485><s%>"
And He directed <S%G3853><s%> the multitude <S%G3793><s%> to sit <S%G377><s%> down <S%G377><s%> on the ground; <S%G1093><s%>

and He took <S%G2983><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> loaves <S%G740><s%> and the fish; <S%G2486><s%> and giving <S%G2168><s%> thanks, <S%G2168><s%> He broke <S%G2806><s%> them and started giving <S%G1325><s%> them to the disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and the disciples <S%G3101><s%> [in turn,] to the multitudes. <S%G3793><s%>

And they all <S%G3956><s%> ate, <S%G2068><s%> and were satisfied, <S%G5526><s%> and they picked <S%G142><s%> up what <S%G3588><s%> was left <S%G4052><s%> over <S%G4052><s%> of the broken <S%G2801><s%> pieces, <S%G2801><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> large <S%G4711><s%> baskets <S%G4711><s%> full. <S%G4134><s%>
And those <S%G3588><s%> who ate <S%G2068><s%> were four <S%G5070><s%> thousand <S%G5070><s%> men, <S%G435><s%> besides <S%G5565><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> and children. <S%G3813><s%>
And sending <S%G630><s%> away <S%G630><s%> the multitudes, <S%G3793><s%> He got <S%G1684><s%> into the boat, <S%G4143><s%> and came <S%G2064><s%> to the region <S%G3725><s%> of Magadan. <S%G3093><s%>
